message.content:
I need to identify the specific line items and value of cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the financial statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement section, I can see a line item specifically for this:

```
| Cash and Cash Equivalents |  | 2024-02-05 |
| Beginning Balance  | 8000000.00 | 2024-02-05 |
```

This clearly shows that the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period was 8,000,000.00.

I can also verify this by looking at the balance sheet, which shows that the initial amounts for cash-related items were:
- Cash on Hand: 3,000,000.00 (2023-12-31)
- Bank Deposits: 5,000,000.00 (2023-12-31)
- Total: 8,000,000.00

This confirms that the value of cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period was 8,000,000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'} }
```
